Text: i was able to download this at home it is going to be am and i am still up hope youre having nice dreams right at this moment Bolshoi A Waymp

I just wanted to say hello and wish you a great day I have this feeling that you will want to apologize for not being able to call me this evening Dont even mention it ok You have nothing to worry about with me I want to let you know that I am thinking about youalways and that is why I decided to take a little break from my studying to write you I cannot wait until the next time we are able to spend time on our own I had such a wonderful time talking to you on Friday I did not want it to end and it made me sad to see you go A phone call from you however put a smile right back on my face I want to know everything about you John What makes you happy What makes you laugh What makes you feel warm and fuzzy inside What is your most memorable moment What mischief did you and your siblings get into when you were little Did you have a nickname as a child Did you ever have a favorite Aunt or Uncle that would always take you to fun places What were you like as a teenager May I see a picture of you as a teenager lol I am sure you were just as handsome then as you are now Did you have the same beautiful red hair that you have now Can I run my fingers through it jk ok maybe I am not kidding I want to know where you would like to see yourself in years Do you believe everyone has a soulmate Have you or do you ever want to give yourself completely to someone your heart your soul Do you ever want to see little Johns and little Janes running around What do you like most about yourself Do you have a best friend you know you can count on What are some of the places you want to travel to I want to know all of these things and more So lets enjoy these few but special moments that we already and can continue to share Whether it be a little smile from across the room or just a simple hello I have all of the time in the world I am not going anywhere I will always be right here Close by I guess I will end this here sorry if it was a little long and sorry if I babbled away I agree that we females tend to do that sometimes I realize it will be Monday morning when you read this and I know it will probably be a pretty busy morning for you and me I am going back to my studying now I am sure I will be up late again as usual I cant wait to see you in the morning Talk to you soon
